ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 160
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe nice site - one question though.  What is this ledendary Gnomish Blunderbuss you mention?  Was that the flying machine someone posted a pic of? QdP ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe nice site - one question though. What is this ledendary Gnomish
Blunderbuss you mention? Was that the flying machine someone posted a pic
of?

QdP
